GSD.description:
tcp: annotate data-race around tcp_md5sig_pool_populated

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 7afdf41db86541bad0a2427f2fdec052351202d4. For more details please see the references link.
